Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Vernon
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near 130th/Vernon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th, and Michigan due to, street blockage near 130th/Vernon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Racine.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
